title: Frozen & Modern Disney
description: Test your knowledge of Frozen and modern Disney hits!

questions.question: What is Elsa's magical power in Frozen?
questions.explanation: Elsa was born with the magical ability to create ice and snow, which she struggles to control!

questions.question: Olaf is a snowman who dreams of experiencing summer.
questions.explanation: Olaf loves warm hugs and ironically dreams of summer, not realizing he would melt!

questions.question: What is the famous song from Frozen that Elsa sings?

options.text: Do You Want to Build a Snowman?
For the First Time in Forever

questions.explanation: 'Let It Go' became a worldwide phenomenon, winning the Academy Award for Best Original Song!

questions.question: In Moana, what does she have to return to Te Fiti?
questions.explanation: Moana must return the heart of Te Fiti, a small pounamu stone, to restore life to her island!

questions.question: Maui is a demigod who can shapeshift.
questions.explanation: Maui uses his magical fish hook to transform into various animals, though he's rusty after being stranded for 1000 years!

questions.question: In Encanto, what is special about the Madrigal family?

options.text: They each have a magical gift

questions.explanation: Each family member receives a unique magical gift, except for Mirabel who must save the family's magic!

questions.question: What is the name of Anna and Elsa's kingdom?
questions.explanation: Arendelle is the Scandinavian-inspired kingdom ruled by Elsa as queen, with Anna as princess!

questions.question: In Coco, Miguel travels to the Land of the Dead.
questions.explanation: Miguel accidentally enters the Land of the Dead during DÃ­a de los Muertos and must find his way back before sunrise!
